node.title: UI split in 3 tabs within category loader for separation of concerns
node.description: We can see three tabs where each tab allows us to have separate table for separation of concerns for drawer & summary records.

node.title: Frontend records from drawer to table of pseudo
node.description: We can add manual entries for pseudo from drawer to the table of category loader.
node.preconditions: The user have selected the tab of Pseudo from the 3 tabs above the search facility
node.postconditions: Records are managed and displayed in the table as user adds them from drawer.

node.title: Drawer to Table frontend records
node.description: When we add any entry from drawer it should appear in real time on the table visible to user.
node.preconditions: Drawer is open & A tab is selected from the top on search facility
